title: A Century or the sack
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission, Kip Porteous and Patricia Ludford
brief_description: Looks at sheep shearing in Australia, and the contrasting outlooks of three shearers. A shearing contractor explains the conditions that today’s shearing gangs require, and shearers’ wives have their say. Filmed mainly in the Parkes district of New South Wales.
